mapper.sql: ID as "id" , TITLE as "title" , CONTENT as "content" , USER_ID as "userId" , CREATE_TIME as "createTime" , UPDATE_TIME as "updateTime" , TYPE_ID as "typeId" , KEY_WORD as "keyWord" , PRODUCE1 as "produce1" , READ_COUNT as "readCount" , COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , PRODUCE2 as "produce2" , IMG_URL as "imgUrl"

ID as "id" , TITLE as "title" , CONTENT as "content" , USER_ID as "userId" , CREATE_TIME as "createTime" , UPDATE_TIME as "updateTime" , TYPE_ID as "typeId" , KEY_WORD as "keyWord" , PRODUCE1 as "produce1" , READ_COUNT as "readCount" , COMMENT_COUNT as "commentCount" , PRODUCE2 as "produce2" , IMG_URL as "imgUrl"
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO xy_article
ID, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, TYPE_ID, KEY_WORD, PRODUCE1, READ_COUNT, COMMENT_COUNT, PRODUCE2, IMG_URL,
#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{keyWord}, #{produce1}, #{readCount}, #{commentCount}, #{produce2}, #{imgUrl},
mapper.update:
UPDATE xy_article
ID = #{id}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, USER_ID = #{userId}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, TYPE_ID = #{typeId}, KEY_WORD = #{keyWord}, PRODUCE1 = #{produce1}, READ_COUNT = #{readCount}, COMMENT_COUNT = #{commentCount},
PRODUCE2 = #{produce2}, IMG_URL = #{imgUrl},
WHERE ID=#{id}

DELETE FROM xy_article t WHERE ID in
#{item}

insert.foreach:
INSERT INTO xy_article
item.ID, item.TITLE, item.CONTENT, item.USER_ID, item.CREATE_TIME, item.UPDATE_TIME, item.TYPE_ID, item.KEY_WORD, item.PRODUCE1, item.READ_COUNT, item.COMMENT_COUNT, item.PRODUCE2, item.IMG_URL,

update.foreach:
UPDATE xy_article
ID = #{item.id}, TITLE = #{item.title}, CONTENT = #{item.content}, USER_ID = #{item.userId}, CREATE_TIME = #{item.createTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{item.updateTime}, TYPE_ID = #{item.typeId}, KEY_WORD = #{item.keyWord}, PRODUCE1 = #{item.produce1},
READ_COUNT = #{item.readCount},
COMMENT_COUNT = #{item.commentCount}, PRODUCE2 = #{item.produce2},
IMG_URL = #{item.imgUrl},
WHERE ID=#{item.id}
